data.title: Pitch Perfect Sing-Along Edition | Full Movie | Movies Anywhere
data.meta_description: Purchase Pitch Perfect Sing-Along Edition on digital and stream instantly or download offline. Arriving at her new college, Beca (Anna Kendrick) finds herself not right for any clique but somehow is muscled into one that she never would have picked on her own: alongside mean girls, sweet girls and weird girls whose only thing in common is how good they sound when they sing together. When Beca leads this a cappella singing group out of their traditional arrangements and perfect harmonies into all-new mash-ups, they fight to climb their way to the top of college music competitions. The Pitch Perfect Sing-Along Edition is an outrageously hilarious laugh-out-loud comedy that also stars Anna Camp (The Help), Brittany Snow (Hairspray) and Rebel Wilson (Bridesmaids).
data.text:
One of the best comedies ever made

July 14, 2023

Itâ€™s aimed at Glee fans and teenage girls, but the infectious energy will appeal to a wider audience.

June 26, 2023

Pitch Perfect is still aca-exciting a decade after its release.

October 6, 2022

The singing is great, the jokes are plentiful, and, well...Ben Platt! Need I say more?

September 27, 2022

Pitch Perfect combines the tuneful underdog triumphs of Glee with the sassiness of Bridesmaids to produce a sweet-sounding, wickedly funny movie.

December 17, 2020

Anna Kendrick anchors a terrific cast of young women as they explore internal struggles and external threats in a cappella glory.

December 16, 2020

Features a performance from Rebel Wilson that should turn the actress into a household name.

September 20, 2020

Pitch Perfect isn't always on key, but it's more impressive than a good karaoke performance, enough so to provide plenty of laughs and entertainment.

January 22, 2020

Silly, predictable but funny as hell with an infectiously catchy soundtrack, Pitch Perfect is a ray of cinematic sunshine.

December 9, 2019
